TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create an AirDefenceArea (ControlFeature) represented as Ellipse in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates a AirDefenceArea with an Ellipse GeometricDefinition. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes AirDefence (ControlFeature) message elements, for instance Ground Picture > Air Defence. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created AirDefenceArea is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an AirDefenceArea ControlFeature represented as Ellipse.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the AirDefenceArea correctly.
